verses.verse: <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8088>report<s%> about Thee [and] I <S%H3372>fear.<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2421>revive<s%> Thy <S%H6467>work<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H8141>years,<s%> In the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H3045>make<s%> it <S%H3045>known;<s%> In <S%H7267>wrath<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H7355>mercy.<s%>

<S%H433>God<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> from <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> And the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6290>Paran.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%> His <S%H1935>splendor<s%> <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> And the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of His <S%H8416>praise.<s%>

[His] <S%H5051>radiance<s%> is like the <S%H216>sunlight;<s%> He has <S%H7161>rays<s%> [flashing] from His <S%H3027>hand,<s%> And <S%H8033>there<s%> is the <S%H2253>hiding<s%> of His <S%H5797>power.<s%>

He <S%H5975>stood<s%> and <S%H4058>surveyed<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> He <S%H7200>looked<s%> and <S%H9351>startled<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> Yes, the <S%H5703>perpetual<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H9455>shattered,<s%> The <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H1389>hills<s%> <S%H7817>collapsed.<s%> His <S%H1979>ways<s%> are <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>

I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H3572>Cushan<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H205>distress,<s%> The <S%H3407>tent<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> were <S%H7264>trembling.<s%>

Did the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2734>rage<s%> against the <S%H5104>rivers,<s%> <S%H518>Or<s%> [was] Thine <S%H639>anger<s%> against the <S%H5104>rivers,<s%> <S%H518>Or<s%> [was] Thy <S%H5678>wrath<s%> against the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> That Thou didst <S%H7392>ride<s%> on Thy <S%H5483>horses,<s%> On Thy <S%H4818>chariots<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%>?

Thy <S%H7198>bow<s%> was <S%H5783>made<s%> <S%H6181>bare,<s%> <S%H5783><s%> The <S%H4294>rods<s%> of <S%H561>chastisement<s%> were <S%H7621>sworn.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%> Thou didst <S%H1234>cleave<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> Thee [and] <S%H9123>quaked;<s%> The <S%H2230>downpour<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5674>swept<s%> by. The <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H5414>uttered<s%> <S%H5414>forth<s%> its <S%H6963>voice,<s%> It <S%H5375>lifted<s%> <S%H7315>high<s%> its <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

<S%H8121>Sun<s%> [and] <S%H3394>moon<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in their <S%H2073>places;<s%> They <S%H1980>went<s%> away at the <S%H216>light<s%> of Thine <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> At the <S%H5051>radiance<s%> of Thy <S%H1300>gleaming<s%> <S%H2595>spear.<s%>
In <S%H2195>indignation<s%> Thou didst <S%H6805>march<s%> through the <S%H776>earth;<s%> In <S%H639>anger<s%> Thou didst <S%H1758>trample<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

Thou didst <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> for the <S%H3468>salvation<s%> of Thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> For the <S%H3468>salvation<s%> of Thine <S%H4899>anointed.<s%> Thou didst <S%H4272>strike<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>evil<s%> To <S%H6168>lay<s%> him <S%H6168>open<s%> from <S%H3247>thigh<s%> to <S%H6677>neck.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

Thou didst <S%H9344>pierce<s%> with his own <S%H4294>spears<s%> The <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H6518>throngs.<s%> They <S%H5590>stormed<s%> in to <S%H6327>scatter<s%> us; Their <S%H5951>exultation<s%> [was] <S%H3644>like<s%> those Who <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H6041>oppressed<s%> in <S%H4565>secret.<s%>
Thou didst <S%H1869>tread<s%> on the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with Thy <S%H5483>horses,<s%> On the <S%H9148>surge<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

I <S%H8085>heard<s%> and my <S%H990>inward<s%> <S%H990>parts<s%> <S%H7264>trembled,<s%> At the <S%H6963>sound<s%> my <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H6750>quivered.<s%> <S%H7538>Decay<s%> <S%H935>enters<s%> my <S%H6106>bones,<s%> And in my <S%H8478>place<s%> I <S%H7264>tremble.<s%> <S%H834>Because<s%> I must <S%H5117>wait<s%> <S%H5117>quietly<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>distress,<s%> For the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H5927>arise<s%> [who] will <S%H1464>invade<s%> us.

<S%H3588>Though<s%> the <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H8384>tree<s%> should not <S%H6524>blossom,<s%> And <S%H369>there<s%> be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2981>fruit<s%> on the <S%H1612>vines,<s%> [Though] the <S%H4639>yield<s%> of the <S%H2132>olive<s%> should <S%H3584>fail,<s%> And the <S%H7709>fields<s%> <S%H6213>produce<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H400>food,<s%> Though the <S%H6629>flock<s%> should be <S%H1504>cut<s%> <S%H1504>off<s%> from the <S%H4356>fold,<s%> And <S%H369>there<s%> be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1241>cattle<s%> in the <S%H7517>stalls,<s%>
Yet I will <S%H5937>exult<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation.<s%>

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> is my <S%H2428>strength,<s%> And He has <S%H7760>made<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> like hinds' [feet,] And makes me <S%H1869>walk<s%> on my <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places.<s%> For the <S%H5329>choir<s%> <S%H5329>director,<s%> on my <S%H5058>stringed<s%> <S%H5058>instruments.<s%>
